Sequence Information.Peptide Name: F2 (Rattusin central fragment 12-18, synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, homodimer with intermolecular 1S=S, UCSS2a, XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, defensin fragment, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Park G, Yun H, Min HJ, Lee CW. 2024
Literature.Title: A Novel Dimeric Short Peptide Derived from alpha-Defensin-Related Rattusin with Improved Antimicrobial and DNA-Binding Activities

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (44.44%) toBac8dR: 43%, V=C=T=N: 14%.Activity: active against active against E. coli (MIC 15 ug/ml) and S. aureus (MIC 58 ug/ml).
